name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_231Th
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Th" means the element "thorium" and "231Th" is the isotope "thorium-231" with a half-life of 1.06e+00 days.
